value.title: Real time dashboards in Power BI with Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Good evening, in today's video I will show you how to create a live stream, real time dashboard using an IoT device and Azure IOT hub, stream analytics and Power BI. Hope you enjoy it :)  Link to MS tutorial: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/stream-analytics/stream-analytics-power-bi-dashboard

value.title: Refer to a value, column or row in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever tried to use a specific column, row or value in power query, but didnt now how to do it? value.title: Reuse M code (M functions) created by others easily

We will show you how you can easily re-use M functions in your reports. value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too.
